item.title: Statistics and Graphs: The Basics
item.description: Introduction Information vs Data Watch out for misleading data Frequency Pie Chart Bar Chart Stacked Split Histograms Differences? Calculating dimensions Frequency Density? Line Graphs Averages Which average to use? Ranges Percentiles Variance Conclusion Introduction I started learning about statistics because I found myself doing a lot of operational monitoring (i.e. making systems more observable, instrumenting individual services, and monitoring that data via custom built dashboards).
